amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow local education agencies to use grant money to provide an on-site workforce development coordinator.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 in the Congressional record of July 16, 1997 to allow local education agencies to use grant money to establish a workforce development coordinator who works with local businesses to develop voca-tional education curriculum.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 230 (Roll no. 287).
